fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Consume a player's status messages. The host will post "\_ \_" in their player channel instead of what they normally would've received. This includes potential death messages. If a player dies while affected by your ability, their morning death will be replaced by "\_ \_". Their role in the graveyard will appear to be "\_ \_".
- Once per game, _       _ the entire town. Everyone will effectively be blackmailed, and will only be able to type "\_ \_". If they try saying something else, you attack them unstoppably. Votes will also cease to exist. This will only last a day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
